mapper.select: SELECT license.license_seq as licenseSeq, license.license_num as licenseNum, license.user_copy_count as userCopyCount, license.regist_dt as registDt, license.expire_dt as expireDt, license.license_gb as licenseGb, license.period_gb as periodGb, CASE WHEN license.period_gb = 3 THEN -1 ELSE DATEDIFF(license.expire_dt, CURDATE()) END as remainDt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_license_sub WHERE license_seq=license.license_seq ) as licenseUser FROM tb_license as license WHERE license_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND license_status = 2 ORDER BY licenseSeq DESC ;
